article_title: Worker Out-Of-Pocket Health Costs Have Doubled In Five Years

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: As the economy improves and employees spend more on health care, employer-paid premiums are rising again with an increase of 5.5 percent forecast for 2015 with worker premiums and out-of-pocket costs – which have doubled since 2009 – rising at an even faster clip. The annual health care cost analysis by [...]
